item.description:
Join us for dim sum this Saturday. Hei La Moon has some of the best dim sum in chinatown. We have three tables reserved for our group. Afterwards, we will walk around the city and take some photos.

Do you have a digital camera and want to take some pics of scenic Boston? Then bring your camera. All are welcome for the post dim sum photo walk. We do have some photo enthusiasts who will be there to answer any questions you may have about cameras and picture taking.

We hope you can make it.

For reviews on Hei La Moon:

http://www.yelp.com/b...
item.how_to_find_us: We have tables reserved downstairs dining area.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Dimsum & photo walk
